comment: For GSU not Kennesaw. One of the best teachers to have if you're only there for the summer DE credit. DO NOT TAKE if you want to learn something. Course consisted of 12 quizzes (open note) and 12 discussions (3 per week) and final (not open note but yk). Claims to check emails often but doesn't (not that it matters). Easiest class ever.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: He is good and geniue person. he has appropriate knowledge about subject. moreover he takes more lesson if you have any doubt. Must recommeded
DISCIPLINE IS THE KEY!
He is the best and so easy going and for him professionalism matters alot but he is the best and you can get the best being the best with him☺️
He is amazing professor. He is having a great knowledge about subject. Moreover, I recommend him great instructor with great knowledge of subject. Help to grow in career

Lectures can be boring, but are very helpful for the tests. Prof Hutchinson is very funny. He started taking attendance but eventually stopped because people stopped coming to class. We did not use the book, AT ALL! I would take him again. Easy A if you go to class and take good notes. Tests are online.
I thought I wasnt doing well but ended with an A! Does alot to make up for poor test scores.

The most chill professor I have taken at Kennesaw and I am a junior. There are six pop quizzes but at the end of the semester he just decided to give everyone 100s for the quiz portion of our grade. There are three exams. The final is 100 true and false but this semester he gave us the test to study before the final.

Hutch is super cool. He lectures each class but has all his powerpoints on his youtube channel. Gives study guides. The first 2 were hard but the last 2 he was nice enough and gave us the exact questions. Just googled them and got the answers.  Overall he knows his stuff and is funny. 4 tests, drops lowest. "quizzes" but always gave 100. Take him!

Does not check email, had four tests, drops lowest, gave word for word study guides for last two but first two were extremely difficult (class average for exam 1 was 45.) Ended the class with a B. Would take again.

One of my favorite professors I have taken at Kennesaw! His lectures are interesting engaging and fun. He clearly is passionate about history. The tests are easy and he gives you very applicable study guides. Pop quizzes are used as a way of keeping track of attendance. He understands what it's like to be a student and goes out of his way to help

Im usually terrible in history classes but he made things a lot easier with his notes and study guides. he gives a few quizzes and 4 tests counting the final but he gives 100% on quizzes b/c theyre to test your attendance. So hes an easy grader and even curved a few tests. The only time youll have homework or use the book is to study before tests
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Professor Hutchinson is a great professor. Lectures are very interesting and he always shares his thoughts/opinions. Tests are based off the book, not notes. However, study guides are given and look exactly like the tests. Six attendance quizzes are given. There is no homework, just 4 tests (including final exam) and the 6 attendance quizzes.

He is hilarious. His tests are solely from the book, not the notes, but they arent bad at all once you get the hang of it. He only gives pop quizzes when attendance is low but they are as easy as "What is your name?"
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Don't take 1111 unless you want a class based on opinions with this professor. He's probably better in 1112 but I did not take that class so I wouldn't know. The grades are based on 3 tests and a final as well as pop quizzes. I'd go to class so you get to take the quizzes but the book is what will help you with the tests
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Hutchinson was a pretty good teacher! He's definitely hilarious, and wasn't afraid to let us know what his opinions were which is super refreshing since so many teachers keep their personal opinions secret. He gives study guides for tests which I appreciated SO much, they really help. He gives random (and very easy) quizzes, though, so go to class!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Hilarious

comment: Prof Hutchinson made me love history. I have never taken a history course that I actually fully retained and enjoyed learning the content until taking his class. If I could I would without a doubt take him again. He's mega laid back but definitely wants a mutual respect. He gives you a study guide for the test, as long as you do that you'll be fine

what I really appreciate is that Prof. Hutch designs his own lectures and explains the course material really well. no homework. study guide for both exams, verbatim to what is on the actual test. pop quizzes only to track attendance.  if you work with the study guide this class is an easy A.

Random (mostly easy) pop quizzes throughout the semester. Lots of videos. Gives a study guide that is what will be verbatim what is on the actual test. Textbook is essential to filling out the study guide correctly.  Funny guy. Very laid back.

10 quizzes randomly given through out the semester (Super SUPER easy).  2 Exams and he gives you a study guide that is word for word the exam.  Lots of youtube videos (mostly relevant but sometimes irrelevant).  Super sarcastically hilarious.  TAKE HIM!!

He's an amazing professor. Super funny, knows his stuff, and made the class easy. He gives study guides for the midterm and final which are both very helpful. Very easy A as long as you come to class. Would recommend him to everyone.
By far one of the most interesting classes I've ever had, and normally I really don't like history.

Prof. Hutchinson is really funny and his lectures are easy and he gives a lot of comic relief. He shows a lot of videos and his lectures are from youtube. There are only two tests, the midterm and final but he gives random pop quizzes. There is a study guide for both tests but make sure to take notes and read the text book for the tests too.

I didn't really care for him. The class consists of a midterm and a final and a few quizzes that he gives out when attendance is low. His sense of humor is dry, and he isn't afraid to offend his students with his views. He does give a study guide which is extremely helpful for the tests, but the lectures are incredibly long and boring.
Easy class, read the chapters for the weekly quizzes and writing assignments and you will pass the class! very nice guy!

Great professor. Class based off of one midterm and one final, along with five in class pop quizzes. Tests are based off of study guides. Be in class. He likes to quiz when he sees low attendance. Not a bad class at all.
10 quizes.  go to class, because there pop quizes. He gives the answers to you 2 test.  remember the test bank. He gives you the study guide which is test bank Its easier than getting a art degree.

He is a great guy, I couldn't really follow his teaching style. His power points were good at the beginning but by the end of the semester he was just showing videos. He only gives a midterm and a final which are both hard, he does send out a study guide but it's usually stuff we barely talked about.
Hutch rules! He was hilarious and his assignments were easy. If you do the work you will for sure pass with an A! Take him!

Lecture-based class with 10 quizzes on random days.  Two tests: midterm and final. His lectures are all online if you do have to miss but I wouldn't advise skipping because you may miss a quiz. Never really used the book. Professor Hutchinson shows lots of videos and doesn't make the class harder than it needs to be.

Mr. Hutchinson makes everything so easy on the students.. He assigns 10 quizzes throughout the semester which are usually about 5 questions that are extremely simple. There are only 2 tests, both of which he gives you a pretty exact study guide. There are no papers, no other assignments, just show up to class and listen to his really great lectures
This professor taught in a witty and interesting way that really helped me to learn the material and he makes it very possible to do well in his class!

Hutch is a great professor. He makes references to pop culture and shows videos that actually apply to what is being discussed. Although attendance isn't mandatory, he notices when attendance is light and will give a pop quiz. Reading isn't necessary. Easy A if you pay attention in class and do the study guides.

Prof. Hutch is awesome. He lectures too fast to take notes & he knows it, so he's lazy and gives you a study guide for the 2 tests (midterm and final) they have the test questions on them. Takes random attendance "quizzes" (write your name & fav. ice cream, name one civilization we talked about today). TAKE HIM.
Hutch ROCKS! As long as you do all of the work you will be fine. The work is super easy and we got a study guide (the test) for the final.
He's the best professor I've ever had. He made me like history for the first time in my life.  He's also hilarious and gives you chances to really succeed.  I would take him for history every time.

If you don't take prof Hutch, you are absolutely crazy!!! He is fantastic, enjoys teaching (or at least it comes off that way), will help you if you need anything, and all around a very exciting class. I went in treading to take this course but came out LOVING history!!! If he could teach all of my classes I would take him hands down.

Great professor! Easy A if you do the weekly assignments and quiz. Did not have midterms, only one final (cumulative). The study guide for the final makes it very easy. He is hilarious and very helpful. Attendance is not mandatory but I would prefer to go to the lectures cause he makes it very interesting. Would take him again!
Attended class pretty much never. A middle schooler could get an A in this class

Hutch was the bomb. Lectures were clear, usually took up the entire class time, but he's hilarious so they go by quickly for the most part. Happy to help, up to date on what's going in the world (and knows what he's talking about!), and appears to be the Thor of History. Overall a positive experience.

Hutch is the best. He really tries to work with you and though attendance isn't mandatory, you really want to be there because his lectures are very engaging. His humor and how handsome he is will make anyone become interested in history. Final study guide he gives is awesome because it is exactly the final word for word.

Professor Hutchinson's lectures are extremely engaging and informative. He is a history geek and is very knowledgeable on the subject. If you want to learn a lot and laugh along the way, take him. He isn't out to ruin your GPA, he genuinely wants to teach you about history. Class is not mandatory, but he will make you want to go to class!

As everyone's said, he's hilarious and sarcastic, which is refreshing to have for a professor. Knows his stuff. Weekly writing assignments and online quizzes. No tests, except final (which is really straightforward). Would recommend.

Amazing history teacher, hands down favorite of all time. Take this class if you're in for a laugh and want a teacher that actually cares about the subject... otherwise just skip over of course. Weekly quiz short writings, need your book unfortunately. Study guide for final is amazing, no doubt you need this teacher, waitlist if you must!!!

Literally my favorite professor i've ever had. He's extremely insightful and has an entertaining personality. The class work is fair and isn't difficult to keep up with. Online quizzes and two writing assignments per week-- doesn't take long at all to do. On Halloween weekend he gave us no homework because it was "the holiest of holidays." fun prof

Super cool and hilarious dude! Online quizzes and weekly writing assignments (250 words minimum) are easy if you have the book. No tests but do have comprehensive final. If D2L has problems, you might get a free pass for missed assignments. Lectures can be long, but he uses lots of videos too. TAKE THIS CLASS if you need the credit.

You will never again have the opportunity to take a history class with such an amazing professor! Absolutely hilarious. So laid back and down to earth, crazy to think that he's a history nerd. Loved his class. Wish he taught something else besides History classes! TAKE HIM! Online quizzes! No test!

AWESOME! He is HILARIOUS! Lectures aren't mandatory. NO TESTS! Weekly quizzes and responses. VERY EASY! IF YOU ENJOY COMEDY AND AN AWESOME TEACHER, TAKE HIM! He grades really good, if you have any questions, he is easily approachable. I wish every teacher I had was like this! EASY A!

I have never liked history but Hutch could be one of my favorite teachers Ive ever had. He is very clear with his material and seems like he loves what he does. He will crack jokes throughout class and they make the lectures somewhat fun. If you have the chance to take him, do it!
Thor is one of my favorite teachers. While he may not be the easiest (though he's close), The Cloud-bringer is definitely the most fun. If you get the chance, you can't get much better than Odin-son.
HUTCHINSON 4 VICE PRESIDENT!!!! You have my vote

If you enjoy reading I would highly recommend this class. In the online class you have to complete 10 chapter discussions and primary discussion questions. There is also a quiz on every chapter. Don't expect to ask the teacher a question and get a quick response via email. Super slow. Fair at grading.

I read over 1000 pages in the text book for this class.  Quizzes are difficult if you don't read the material. There are 46 discussions assignments but you only have to do 20.  Be prepared for an english lesson with his feedback on your posts. End of semester assigment was a little vague.

Really easy class! I don't know why some people said it's a lot of reading...I rarely read the book. It was kind of a waste to buy. The only reason you need it is for some of the online discussions. Not a single test or essay. Only online quizzes and discussions. For all map quizzes he gives you a map before the quiz and places to identify. SO EASY
Absolutely Wonderful. Professor Hutchinson is the most helpful professor I've ever had. As long as you8 do the reading and ask questions when you need to, you will pass with an A.
Lectures are AMAZING. My only complaint was that I wished he could have provided more direct feedback from our work. But other than that, I really enjoyed his class.

Loved, loved, loved this class. Took this class last semester and loved his class. History is boring but he makes it interesting and fun. He's funny and was surprised he wasnt upset that out of 250 students only 30% showed up. Quizzes on every chapter, a LOT of reading. Would love to take another of his classes.

Hutch was a great professor. He explained the information in every way. The quizzes were a little difficult at first, but he makes it easy to improve your grade if you made a bad average on a quiz or two. Overall, he made the class interesting and was a really fun professor.
I LOVE YOU HUTCH
This guy is a great teacher! If you can take his class do because he is cool and makes the class easy!
As a former student of this professor, I will assure you...he deserves a chili pepper! Also the class is awesome and I learned so much!

Take this class! He is very flexible, makes class very interesting and hes hilarious. Tests and quizzes are all online and there is no final. I didn't crack open the textbook once and I made an A in the class.

Professor Hutchinson is the best professor ever. I love him even though it's a ton of work but stay on top of your game and you will make a good grade. I wish professor taught all my classes that I needed to take. If you want a easy professor and fun take him.

This is one of those classes where you learn a whole lot, but (unless you stay on top of you work) you make a low grade, just for laziness. I love Hutch, he's the man. Very easy to get an A, although I did not.

Professor Hutch makes his lectures extremely interesting. He knows how college students work, so the format of his class, lectures, and material all make history fun and easy. Get the book. Attendance isn't mandatory, but his thoughts and teaching style are too great to pass up. Take. Him.

He is funny and reasonable. There are no tests or final. Just stay on top of the online quizzes and discussions. You have to read the book though, the quizzes are not from his lectures. He doesn't take attendance. This course is easy and the prof is chill.
Hutch is a very helpful and insightful teacher. Easy to listen to and easy to follow. No surprises in this class. No final. No test. All quizzes!

Very easy class.If you fail this class or make a lower than an A, you are not college material.Very easy quizzes and discussions. The only problem is that he takes forever to grade discussions and post quizzes. other than that, the best teach there is in Kennesaw.
Quizzes are all online. Very easy class but very engaging. He makes history fun and incorporates videos during his presentations. I definitely learned a lot in his class. Take him.

Probably my favorite professor of all time. He is so sarcastic and hilarious! He has no tests and no final, and he gives extra credit! Best professor I have had by far in my college experience. You don't have to study, take the practice quiz on the website the books offers, same quiz, word for word. Definitely take him, I'm trying to get him again!

This class was not easy, but not hard. He understands that every college student have other classes during the semester and more importantly, a life, so he will not suprise you with non sence work. And yes, I do agree, Hutchinson for President.
I wish he could teach the rest of my courses. Hutchinson for 2016 PRESIDENT!!! YES WE CAN.
Take his class.

I do not normally rate my professors, but I feel it is my duty to do so;therefore, I will rate him. Hutchinson has been the greatest history professor in the state of Georgia. His class will require you to study at least one hour per week.     HUTCHINSON FOR PRESIDENT on 2016!!! YES WE CAN
Hutchinson is the coolest history professor Kennesaw State has to offer. I wish he could teach the rest of my courses.

I learned so much in this course. This is a fantastic professor!!! He made everything so interesting, I wanted to go to class every week. He's funny and sarcastic and always helpful. I wish I could take him again.

Hutchinson is the best professor I've had while attending KSU. He knows his material, and doesn't jerk you around with surprise assignments and online BS. I would definitely take him again if able, and would suggest no one else for classes that he teaches. He's witty, sarcastic, and makes the lectures something you WANT to attend. Highly recommend.

Hutch is an awesome professor. I wasn't always in class but he was clear on what he wanted and if you didn't understand than he would easily explain it to you. If you're not a history person, he is definitely the prof for you. He makes the boring stuff interesting and everything else is just easy.

To get an A in this class, you must purchase the book & put in a max of an hour or 2 a week of study/writing time. Grades break down this way: seven 200 point essays (very short,250 words) and 14 100pt quizzes. I never read any of the book except the primary sources for the essays. I didn't need to; scanning the book for quiz questions was enough.

Awesome guy! Class is very straight forward. No final, just weekly quizzes & a few one page writing assignments. Quizzes are a piece of cake if you take advantage of the review website from the textbook & go to class. Writing assn. are a pain, but not a hard grader. Offers extra credit at end of semester. Laid back dude that I would def. recommend!

Prof Hutch was funny and made class extremely interesting. Although I already love history, anyone who does not will still enjoy this class. Although he does take a while to get back to emails, he is as understanding with us as students as we are with the fact that we are not his only priority.  I highly recommend him as a professor!
I passed this class but he is a horrible communicator.  Also this class did not challenge me at all, this was at least 3 grade levels below me.

This is a great professor. Wonderfully sarcastic. Enough to make class very interesting. For those whining about him not responding to your emails..perhaps they were stupid questions that you can find answers to probably the syllabus. If its a legit question, he will answer it! Take prof. Hutch and you won't regret it!

He's a great professor! I didn't have him this semester, but I had him last semester. And all I can say that man is fantastic... TAKE HIM! Just click the box right now! Or write down the CRN... whatever you have to do take him! No other professor is worth it! GAH! What are you waiting for??!!?
Hutch is the man. Hands down.

GREAT professor! The quizzes are easy if you attend class and read the section, and the writing assignments never ask for anything more than simply answering the prompt. Use your sources, attend class (which is always enjoyable and often hilarious), and keep an understanding attitude, and you'll do fine.

AWESOME guy! I enjoyed the class but I will admit that I did not attend every class. However I did use the resources he gave and made an A! He layed out the format of the class on the first day and gave clear instructions on how to do well. I'm sure for those of you who had legit questions, they were hidden among the gobs of ignorant questions.
Professor hutchinson is one of the best teachers i have ever had at KSU. He's funny and keeps you very interested in the class. I wish he were teaching 2112!

Very VERY funny and sweet! Professor Hutch is extremely awesome. He has a great sense of humor and is really passionate about history. He offers a different perspective on things but is respectful to other views. HIGHLY recommended. No, he's not super fast on the emails, but who could be when they're getting hundreds a day?

SO awesome! He really keeps the class interesting. The quizzes and writing assignments really aren't difficult. He warns you on the first day of class that he will randomly give out secret words that will be on the quiz. He's very willing to work with you. I never thought a history class could be so entertaining. Great professor, great class!!! :)

He's awesome. To the people that complain about him not answering e-mails - it's because a million people e-mailed him every single day. Get over yourself and grow up, this is college. Take him if you can. He's funny and nice and really awesome. He's also a great teacher.
This professor is okay, he tool all semester to answer emails.. so there is nothing wrong with me. Thanks though
Coolest professor I've ever had. He is hilarious which will keep your attention during class. Read the chapters and do the practice tests for the text and you will get a good grade!

Awesome professor. He gives out clear instructions in class and is very helpful. He doesn't always answer emails (because most of the questions asked are answered in class) but he will help if you ask him. He's a great guy and you will get an A if you actually try and put in some effort.

I'm a B+ student, but with this guy it is ok to be a C- student. He thinks it's perfect when everyone gets a 70 on his quizzes. He gives no help on writing assignments, never answers email's, and he teaches things that are hardly on the quizzes. Read the book-WORD FOR WORD if you even want to get a C.

This professor is AMAZING!!! Attendance isn't that mandatory, but its good to come to class, b/c he gives out extra points, and secret words that you need on a quiz. He is very helpful and his class is easy. There is no reason to get below a B in this class..He also looks like Clay Mathews!!! =) But this is definitely the professor U need 4 HIST.

Super funny, just you have to buy the book. Take the practice quizzes from the link he gives you at the beginning of the year and there is no way you can fail his quizzes(takes quiz questions from practice quizzes) Worth taking. promise!

There is nothing bad to say about him or his class. He's funny, knows his stuff, and can utilize technology properly. He keeps me interested! His powerpoints help, but those videos he chooses are the best! Reading the book helps and you should go to class because of the bonus questions for the quizzes. Most of the grades are quizzes!

Easy and interesting class. Very cool laid back guy. He only sends attendance around a few times or so, so go to class, it's worth it. Tests are not difficult and if you make a 95 or higher in the class you can exempt the final. The midterm was a paper so make sure you get the book and to use for questions on tests. Lots of extra credit. Must take

One of the best professors I have ever had. You can't really get bored in his class, he's just too funny. He teaches history with an objective view. 7 quizzes, 1 midterm, 1 final. If you pay attention in class and look at the online study guide, you'll be fine. He's also very helpful and nice. Oh and he loves China! Jk, idk why people say that.
Good teacher, good guy, easy tests. Just STUDY. If you review the online questions and know the maps you will do just fine. I"d highly recommend him, even at 8 am.

Great professor, would recommend.  Makes history interesting, relearned history from a different perspective.  Only suggestion I have for him is to work on communication skills outside of class.  (i.e.: answering emails) Other than that loved the class.
Very straightforward about what is on tests.  Midterm was somewhat annoying because it was written and complex.  Prof Hutch is funny and entertaining, should earn an A with medium effort.

He's really great. The class is easy but not too easy. All of the test questions are online and if you make above a 95 you can exempt the final. He gives extra credit and you only use the book for the sources sometimes. He loves China, likes when people when tell him he looks like Thor, and quotes Dazed and Confused everyday. Take him!!!

Class is not difficult, simply study what he tells you to study and you should be able to ace the quizzes.  The midterm is difficult, but it's a midterm.  Can exempt final with a 95 or better, and with all the extra credit he offers this isn't hard to do.
One of the best professors I've had!! Makes history interesting.  Tells you what to study, tests are easy(if you study what he tells you).  Great class!!! I would take him again for other classes.

He is easy but very sarcastic. Allows you to exempt the final with a 95 or above, which is possible. You have five test, midterm, and final. The test are majority the ID questions from the book website- study those!I didnt have a book, but you do need the book for your essay midterm. Attendance is 10% of grade and he takes it randomly.

He is an AWESOME professor! His tests are very easy to pass and his lectures are very interesting. He relates the material to modern issues and uses lots of media to make the class more interesting. I would absolutely recommend this professor!

Hutchinson is a pretty good teacher, all the tests are straight from the online quizzes. The lectures are somewhat boring but he adds a lot of videos and stuff. If you study the quizzes you'll get a good grade easily.

Unbelievably easy. Takes attendance 10 times a semester for 10 points in the class. I barely ever went, except for test days and when the midterm was due. Test questions are pulled verbatim from an online quiz. Couldn't recommend a professor more.

I definitely recommend everyone to take this class with this professor! You learn so much! The tests are so easy if you just do the practice tests online (he takes the exacts questions from it and puts them on the test) I'm telling you if you take him there should be no reason for you not to get an A. He does take attendance sometimes. Take him!

This guy has to be one of my favorite teachers I have ever had.  His philosophical approach is what entertains me the most, you learn to look at history with a different perspective.  Great teacher overall.

Very entertaining and funny guy. Basically he presents powerpoints everyday and if you take notes and read the chapters  you should do well on his tests. He even gives tips on how to pass his tests which he believes to be easy yet they're of moderate difficulty. If you take the online practice tests and do the vocab (only hw) you'll do fine.
Great Professor although some of the topics are pretty boring. Look over the practice exams he has online before the test, and you will get an A.
Make this choice... you wont regret

I recommend this professor to EVERYONE who can get him! His lectures are informative and interesting and he posts all the notes online. On top of being a funny guy and a good professor, he also gives you everything you need to ace the tests an quizzes. Take some time to study that material and you will earn an A. You won't regret taking his class.

Very helpful professor. Really was passionate about the material and always made us laugh. He speaks the truth on all issues for the time period in history. Never once did I think he purely voiced his own opinion. I Had a great semester.

Loved the teacher! Really good, funny, easy, held my interest. History has never really been my subject, but this class wasn't bad at all! Take online quizzes and you are good to go! Also, gave out more extra credit than I knew what to do with! It definitely is a boost to your grade! Take him and you won't regret it!

I really did not enjoy this teacher. He tried so hard to NOT teach from a Eurocentric, conservative perspective that sometimes he ended up teaching things incorrectly. Also, he used a lot of profanity and had little respect for views other than his own. It's an easy class if you just use the website questions he gives you, but not worth it.

This man is a trip! He was so funny and me want to learn about history. The quizzes were not easy even though he pulls the exact same questions off of the book website. If you want to laugh and get credits at the same time, take him!

I think he's cute... But it's really easy if you study, and when I say study I mean use the website quizzes because that's where it's pulled from plus he offers tons of extra credit. He makes boring history really funny

Wonderful professor! Notes are PowerPoint and for your better understanding, as quizzes and exams are straight from the online questions. Very passionate and knowledgeable about the material and is beyond willing to help! Also offers many extra credit opportunities.
If you study, you will do fine.  You need to show up to class to be prepared for the quizzes and tests.  Plenty of opportunities for extra credit.
Funny Prof, I enjoy going to his class, he uses the book and posts outlines of the powerpoints online. Very passionate and knows the material. A guy you would wanna have a beer with.

He can talk for forever, but I never got anything out of his lectures. He's a funny guy but he makes a lot of awkward comments concerning women, uncomfortable at times. Quizzes were more like tests, and I found them to be hard even when I studied the whole day. You use the website more than the book definitely. I don't think I would take him again.

Professor is passionate but its not an easy class.... maybe if you love history. Alot of material.. Quizzes are long and extremely hard, more like tests. You have to study a huge amount of material to cover what the quiz alone will be over and he doesnt narrow it down at all.

He is absolutely amazing and he makes it worth going to class! He gives a lot of extra credit, but even the quizzes are easy if you pay attention. He is strangely hot and I'm also pretty sure he's a redditor...
This professor was great! He is very passionate!
Great teacher!!!!!! LOVED him. made the class fun. and understood we had other classes and things outside of this one class.
I loved this class! Very passionate professor! and he's weirdly attractive!

amazingggggg teacher! you will actually want to show up to class just to hear him lecture, because hes awesome.takes roll every now an then. theres alot of vocab, not a big deal, just do it. do online quizzes and you'll do well in the class! coolest guy ever.

He makes the class very interesting! Mostly lectures with powerpoints, but they're interesting and he also shows video. You have to do a lot of vocab but you can use the internet. If you study the notes and read the sources you can do well on the tests. Also do the practice quizzes online, he takes a lot of quiz questions from there!

imagine seth rogen teaching an awesome history class.  i honestly did not like history until this course.  He's funny and quizzes are incredibly easy all you need is one good night of studying before each quiz and final and you got an a
